description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于北京的中国电子商务公司，主要为B2C模式的购物网站。
description.en: A Chinese e-commerce company headquartered in Beijing, primarily operating as a B2C shopping website.

description.zh-cn: 京东集团的创始人。
description.en: Founder of JD.com.

description.zh-cn: 刘强东的初恋女友，“京东”的名字来源于二人名字的组合。
description.en: Liu Qiangdong's first girlfriend; the name 'Jingdong' is derived from a combination of their names.

description.zh-cn: 京东集团首席执行官。
description.en: CEO of JD.com.

description.zh-cn: 中国一家跨国企业控股公司，是世界上最大的视频游戏供应商，以及拥有各种社交媒体、娱乐、人工智能和技术业务。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology and entertainment conglomerate and holding company.

description.zh-cn: 腾讯公司执行董事、总裁。
description.en: Executive Director and President of Tencent.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国跨国零售企业，总部设在阿肯色州本顿维，为世界上最大的公司。
description.en: An American multinational retail corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores.

description.zh-cn: 中国B2C电子商务网站，后被京东从沃尔玛收购。
description.en: A Chinese B2C e-commerce website, later acquired by JD.com from Walmart.

zh-cn: 京东数字科技控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 原为京东集团的金融部门，后被剥离独立运营。
description.en: Formerly the financial arm of JD.com, later spun off to operate independently.

description.zh-cn: 一家位于美国的跨国科技公司，业务范围涵盖互联网搜索、云计算、广告技术等领域。
description.en: An American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products.

description.zh-cn: 2018年8月，京东CEO刘强东在美国明尼苏达州因涉嫌性侵被捕，引发了广泛的媒体关注和法律诉讼，并对京东的股价和声誉造成了负面影响。
description.en: In August 2018, JD.com CEO Liu Qiangdong was arrested in Minnesota, USA, on suspicion of sexual assault, leading to widespread media attention, legal proceedings, and a negative impact on JD.com's stock price and reputation.

description.zh-cn: 中国网络名人、投资人，刘强东的妻子。
description.en: Chinese internet celebrity, investor, and wife of Liu Qiangdong.

description.zh-cn: 中国脱口秀演员。
description.en: A Chinese stand-up comedian.

description.zh-cn: 指一种备受争议的“早上9点上班，晚上9点下班，每周工作6天”的工作制度，常见于部分中国大陆的互联网公司。
description.en: Refers to a controversial work schedule of '9 a.m. to 9 p.m., 6 days a week', common in some mainland Chinese internet companies.

description.zh-cn: 中国财富和资产管理服务提供商。
description.en: A Chinese wealth and asset management service provider.

description.zh-cn: 承兴系公司通过伪造与京东等公司的供应链贸易，骗取信托融资，诈骗金额高达300多亿元人民币的案件。
description.en: A case where Camsing-related companies defrauded trust financing of over 30 billion RMB by faking supply chain trades with companies like JD.com.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的专门人民法院，管辖上海市辖区内相关金融民商事案件和金融行政案件。
description.en: A specialized court in Shanghai, China, with jurisdiction over relevant financial civil, commercial, and administrative cases within Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 美国的跨国性金融服务公司，经营纳斯达克股票交易所。
description.en: An American multinational financial services corporation that owns and operates the NASDAQ stock market.

description.zh-cn: 香港的证券交易所，为世界主要交易所之一。
description.en: The stock exchange of Hong Kong, one of the world's major stock exchanges.

description.zh-cn: 刘强东于1998年6月18日创立了京东集团。
description.en: Liu Qiangdong founded JD.com on June 18, 1998.

description.zh-cn: 龚晓京是刘强东的初恋女友。
description.en: Gong Xiaojing was Liu Qiangdong's first girlfriend.

description.zh-cn: 京东的名字来源于创始人刘强东及其初恋女友龚晓京名字的组合。
description.en: The name 'Jingdong' is derived from a combination of the names of founder Liu Qiangdong and his first girlfriend, Gong Xiaojing.

description.zh-cn: 许冉担任京东集团的首席执行官。
description.en: Xu Ran serves as the CEO of JD.com.

description.zh-cn: 腾讯于2014年3月10日以2.14亿美元入股京东，成为其重要股东。
description.en: Tencent invested $214 million in JD.com on March 10, 2014, becoming a major shareholder.

description.zh-cn: 腾讯与京东建立了战略合作伙伴关系。
description.en: Tencent and JD.com established a strategic partnership.

description.zh-cn: 作为腾讯入股京东协议的一部分，腾讯总裁刘炽平加入京东董事会。
description.en: As part of Tencent's investment deal, Tencent President Martin Lau joined JD.com's board of directors.

description.zh-cn: 沃尔玛将其在线零售平台“1号店”出售给京东，以换取京东约5%的股权，并后续增持。
description.en: Walmart sold its online retail platform 'Yihaodian' to JD.com in exchange for an approximately 5% stake in JD.com, and later increased its holding.

description.zh-cn: 京东从沃尔玛处收购了在线零售平台“1号店”的业务。
description.en: JD.com acquired the business of the online retail platform 'Yihaodian' from Walmart.

description.zh-cn: 京东集团于2017年剥离其金融业务部门京东金融，以符合中国金融服务牌照的监管要求。
description.en: In 2017, JD.com spun off its financial services arm, JD Finance, to comply with regulatory requirements for financial services licenses in China.

description.zh-cn: Google向京东投资5.5亿美元。
description.en: Google invested $550 million in JD.com.

description.zh-cn: 刘强东因涉嫌性侵在美国被捕，对其个人声誉造成严重损害。
description.en: Liu Qiangdong was arrested in the United States on suspicion of sexual assault, causing severe damage to his personal reputation.

description.zh-cn: 受刘强东涉嫌性侵风波影响，京东股价大幅下跌，公司声誉受损。
description.en: Following the sexual assault allegation against Liu Qiangdong, JD.com's stock price dropped significantly, and the company's reputation was damaged.

description.zh-cn: 刘强东与章泽天是夫妻关系。
description.en: Liu Qiangdong and Zhang Zetian are husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 京东宣布与脱口秀演员杨笠合作，因其过往言论引发争议，导致部分网民抵制京东。
description.en: JD.com's announcement of a collaboration with comedian Yang Li sparked controversy over her past remarks, leading to a boycott by some netizens.

description.zh-cn: 京东被指推行“996工作制”，引发了关于员工工作时长和劳动权益的争议。
description.en: JD.com has been criticized for implementing the '996 working hour system', sparking controversy over employee working hours and labor rights.

description.zh-cn: 诺亚控股旗下的歌斐资产因“承兴案”相关合同纠纷向京东提起诉讼。
description.en: Noah Holdings' subsidiary, Gopher Asset Management, filed a lawsuit against JD.com over contract disputes related to the 'Camsing case'.

description.zh-cn: 京东被卷入承兴公司的合同诈骗案引发的诉讼中，公司声誉和权益遭受损失。
description.en: JD.com was implicated in a lawsuit arising from the Camsing contract fraud case, suffering damage to its reputation and interests.

description.zh-cn: 承兴系公司通过融资诈骗使诺亚控股遭受了超过80亿元人民币的损失。
description.en: The Camsing case caused Noah Holdings to suffer losses of over 8 billion RMB due to financing fraud.

description.zh-cn: 在关于承兴案的诉讼中，上海金融法院一审判决不支持原告诺亚控股对京东的诉讼请求。
description.en: In the lawsuit regarding the Camsing case, the Shanghai Financial Court ruled in the first instance against the plaintiff Noah Holdings' claims against JD.com.

description.zh-cn: 京东集团于2014年5月22日在美国纳斯达克证券交易所挂牌上市。
description.en: JD.com was listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange in the United States on May 22, 2014.

description.zh-cn: 京东集团于2020年6月18日在香港交易所挂牌上市。
description.en: JD.com was listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on June 18, 2020.
